required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retention Rate of Self-etch Resin Based Sealant With and Without Prior Sandblasting
clinical_study.official_title: Retention Rate of Self-etch Resin Based Sealant With and Without Prior Sandblasting Versus Total Etch Resin Based Sealant in High Caries Risk Patients After One Year Follow up

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to clinically assess the effect of sandblasting prior to self-etch resin based sealant on its retention after one year follow up.

primary_outcome.description: •Full retention (FR): the material was fully present on the occlusal surfaces •Partially lost (PL): the material was present, but as a result of either wear or loss of the material, part of a previously sealed pit or fissure, or both, was exposed. •Totally lost (TL): no trace of the material was detected on the surface.

arm_group.description: Self-etch resin based sealant (prevent seal) without prior sandblasting.
Self-etch resin based sealant prevent seal) with prior sandblasting.
Total-etch resin based sealant (ultraseal XT) (Ultradent Pro. Inc., USA)

intervention.intervention_name: Self etch Pit and fissure sealant application (prevent seal)
Self etch Pit and fissure sealant application (prevent seal) with prior sandblasting
intervention.description: Sandblasting before Sealing deep pits and fissures

intervention.intervention_name: Total etch resin based sealant ultraseal xt

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who have existing pits and fissures that are anatomically deep and caries susceptible.
- Stained pits and fissures with minimum decalcification of opacification and no softness at the base of the fissure (ICDAS 1 and 2).
Exclusion Criteria:
- An individual with no previous caries experience and well coalesced pits and fissures.
- Partially erupted teeth.
- Teeth with cavitation or caries of the dentin.
- Teeth with dental fluorosis, Hypocalcification

overall_official.last_name: Rawda Hesham H. Abd ElAziz, Post Phd
